message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive offer.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a price closer to $9,500. I believe this product will be a great addition to my collection, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $10,250. This offer reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your interest.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,800? I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to compromise to make it work.
